title: amazingseller1
author: amazingseller1
content: this will sound crazyand maybe the Legendary ranks will start make jokes as they always do but i need 30 BTC ASAP in 1 week they will get back 31BTCIf u cant just dont replyits for some deal i need to doi have this money in the bank but dont have it as BTCi can send this amount in paypal as assurance ( in return u pay the fee )and of course people will say to buy BTC but i cant do it in few days cuz theres a limit for how much i can buy daily !! so 1 week i will reach 31BTC using other services but atm i need i have only 72 hours for this offerafter that you can assume this post not actual Thank you

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: The level of stupidity some of you scammers have is quite alarming. It's very depressing. You must have disappointed the Almighty creator so bad that the punishment he gave you to be this stupid is well deserved. Carry on.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: amazingseller1 on September 29, 2023, 08:30:00 PMi have this money in the bank but dont have it as BTCSend me a cashier's check for $834,000 and I'll send you 30 BTC in a week.  How does that sound?

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: It does sound crazy it doesn't make you sound rational. You won't get a loan of 30 BTC you shouldn't have wasted your time asking because you've got negative trusts. Before asking for the loan you didn't have any negative trusts but now your account's ruined.Quote from: amazingseller1 on September 29, 2023, 08:30:00 PMthis will sound crazyand maybe the Legendary ranks will start make jokes as they always do but i need 30 BTC ASAP in 1 week they will get back 31BTC

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: It wasn't necessary so why did you make experiments to test users. You've began at 30BTC but it's extraordinarily high so it's expected you won't get it. How's a user supposed to give 30BTC to a stranger. Your account's showing bad trust. You won't get small loans without collateral so why begin at 30BTC you should've lowered the amount.Quote from: amazingseller1 on September 30, 2023, 08:41:22 AMand thats why i was waiting for the stupidity of these legendary !!didnt i said if u cant then dont reply ?plus i dont need 30BTC i was testing how this forum IQ and all the legendary had -1 thank you all i got all i need already

comments.body: Quote from: amazingseller1 on September 29, 2023, 08:30:00 PMthis will sound crazyand maybe the Legendary ranks will start make jokes as they always do but i need 30 BTC ASAP in 1 week they will get back 31BTCIf u cant just dont replyits for some deal i need to doi have this money in the bank but dont have it as BTCi can send this amount in paypal as assurance ( in return u pay the fee )and of course people will say to buy BTC but i cant do it in few days cuz theres a limit for how much i can buy daily !! so 1 week i will reach 31BTC using other services but atm i need i have only 72 hours for this offerafter that you can assume this post not actual Thank you  Quote from: amazingseller1 on September 30, 2023, 08:41:22 AMand thats why i was waiting for the stupidity of these legendary !!didnt i said if u cant then dont reply ?plus i dont need 30BTC i was testing how this forum IQ and all the legendary had -1 thank you all i got all i need already It's not only the legendaries. We, the full members, are equally stupid.You already know that, but if you don't, PayPal is reversible, so you can send me the money and then revert the order How about this, go scam somewhere else, ok?Cheers

comments.author: gamblerlife
comments.body: I am not even a legendary rank but I will still make a joke on you.How can you be so stupid?

comments.author: tetaeridanus
comments.body: Level of IQ below your activity; which is making me lol.
